name: G1 Jockey 2000
overview: G1 Jockey 2000 is the second game in the long series that still are in development in Playstation 3 & Wii consoles with his 4th part. In the G1 Jockey games the players take the role of a rookie who aspires to become a Grade 1 Class ("G1") jockey. As the season progresses, they'll need to learn the subtle art of horse racing -- when to make a move, when to hold back, and when to let loose in the home stretch. G1 Jockey 3 was the first game that was released outside Japan and was for Playstation 2.
